content: jump into summer or at least that summer feeling with the bayside tee crochet pattern made with patons grace and the track stitch this easy top features bold stripes and a laid-back style dressed up or down it has a flattering boat neckline and breezy fabric to keep you cool if it seems short laid flat take a look at the pics on the mannequin and on me - hanging length is affected by gravity and that s taken into account in this pattern but if you put it on and wish it were longer you can easily add more row skill level advanced beginner crochet pattern sizes xs/s m l xl 2/3x 4/5x languages available english **materials** yarn patons north america grace https //amzn to/4jsdroq 2 sport weight 875 and 1600 yards hook us 9 0 - 5 5 mm
